title: Lucy's Story by Anoushka Garg
description: Lucy's Story by Anoushka Garg. Read by Rhiannon Neads from the BBC Radio Drama Company. A Top 50 shortlisted story from BBC Radio 2's 500 WORDS 2015 competition, in the 10-13 years old category.
